sentences.en: At present, much of the wheat contains genes derived from wild rye.
sentences.cn: 目前的小麦含有许多源自野生黑麦的基因.

sentences.en: Behind the counter he cut four fat slices of rye bread and buttered them liberally.
sentences.cn: 他在柜台后面切了四大片的黑麦面包,厚厚地抹上黄油.

sentences.en: By cereals we mean wheat, oats, rye, barley, and all that.
sentences.cn: 谈到谷物,我们指的是小麦 、 燕麦 、 黑麦 、 大麦之类的东西.

sentences.en: Do you want it on whole wheat, white French, or rye?
sentences.cn: 你想用麸皮面包 、 法式面包还是黑面包做三明治?

sentences.en: He poured in a generous splash of rye.
sentences.cn: 他搀入了相当多的黑麦威士忌酒.

sentences.en: I was eating ham and Swiss cheese on rye.
sentences.cn: 我正吃夹火腿和瑞士干酪的黑麦面包。

sentences.en: Rye has many advantages as a winter - sown crop.
sentences.cn: 黑麦作为冬季作物有许多优点.

sentences.en: Rye is not a common feed grain for poultry.
sentences.cn: 黑麦不是家禽所吃的常用谷物饲料.

sentences.en: Rye is tolerant of poor, acid soils.
sentences.cn: 黑麦耐贫瘠的酸性土壤。

sentences.en: Rye is tolerant of poor, acid soils.
sentences.cn: 黑麦耐贫瘠的酸性的土壤.

sentences.en: The best - known grains are wheat, barley, oats, rye and maize.
sentences.cn: 最为人们所熟知的粮食是小麦 、 大麦 、 燕麦 、 黑麦和玉米.

sentences.en: The Catcher in the Rye is the only novel by J.
sentences.cn: 《麦田里的守望者》是杰罗姆﹒大卫﹒塞林格唯一的长篇小说.

sentences.en: The farm grows wheat and rye.
sentences.cn: 这个农场种植小麦和黑麦.

sentences.en: Then he got set with a bottle of rye and waited. He waited a long time.
sentences.cn: 然后,他喝一瓶黑麦威士忌定了定神,就安心等着,等了好久.

sentences.en: Triticale is an intergeneric cross between wheat and rye.
sentences.cn: 黑小麦是小麦与黑麦之间的属间杂交种.

trans.tran_cn: 吉卜赛绅士，黑麦，裸麦威士忌酒
trans.tran_en: a type of grain that is used for making bread and  whisky
